body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Brazil_svg skin-vector

div.p: Flag_of_Brazil.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 720 × 504 pixels, file size: 6 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

p.style: width:30em; border:2px solid #55b05a; margin:1px 0; background:#fff; color:#000;

div.p: W3C ✓ The source code of this SVG is valid

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.div: ភាសាខ្មែរ: ទង់ជាតិប្រេស៊ីល

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

span.i: According to the Brazilian Law on Industrial Property (Law 9.279 from May 14th, 1996; See translation), Chapter IV, Article 191, Brazilian official symbols are Public Domain because they can be copied and reproduced without any permission from the Brazilian government or anyone else unless they are being copied or reproduced with foul intentions.
Hence it is assumed that this image has been released into the public domain.
The usage of coats of arms and flags is governed by legal restrictions, independent of the copyright status of the depiction shown here.

p.span: English | Español | Suomi | Français | Македонски | Português | +/−

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

a.title: This page is protected against editing.

img.alt: This page is protected against editing.

table.style: background:#fff; border:1px solid #aaa; padding:.2em; margin:.5em auto;

td.b: This media file has been protected from editing to prevent vandalism.
td.span: Please discuss changes on the talk page or request unprotection.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:06, 15 September 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 20:20, 15 September 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 08:56, 13 September 2007

td.span: (Now that I finally got some time to look into it deeper, I saw what was wrong in the current version. Sorry for reverting your upload, Pumbaa80. This revision is just a cleanup on Pumbaa80's version (not much to clean, the code was already very good :)).)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 00:39, 9 February 2007

td.span: ({{Flag |NAME= |DEFAULT=1 |OF=Brazil |FROM=1992-05-11 |CREATOR=Benjamin Constant, Raimundo Teixeira Mendes, Miguel Lemos, Manuel Pereira Reis, Décio Vilares |FORMAT=7:10 |FIAV=111111 |MAINCOLORS=green, yellow, blue, white |CHARACTERISTICS= {{Stars|27|)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:13, 14 January 2007

td.span: (exact dimensions from http://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bandeira_do_Brasil; positions and orientations of the stars estimated from the construction sheet given there)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:17, 15 October 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 15:16, 29 August 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 06:33, 9 October 2005

td.span: (This was created by en:User:TigerTjäder, based on the website of the Brazilian Government. He has released this under the GFDL license. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Brasil_Flag.svg)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:18, 9 October 2005
